item.title: Setup
item.description: Making your own Quartz Setting up Quartz requires a basic understanding of git. If you are unfamiliar, this resource is a great place to start!

item.title: Editing Content in Quartz
item.description: Editing Quartz runs on top of Hugo so all notes are written in Markdown. Folder Structure Here’s a rough overview of what’s what.

item.title: Obsidian Vault Integration
item.description: Setup Obsidian is the preferred way to use Quartz. You can either create a new Obsidian Vault or link one that your already have.

item.title: Preview Changes
item.description: If you’d like to preview what your Quartz site looks like before deploying it to the internet, the following instructions guide you through installing the proper dependencies to run it locally.

item.title: Deploying Quartz to the Web
item.description: Hosting on GitHub Pages Quartz is designed to be effortless to deploy. If you forked and cloned Quartz directly from the repository, everything should already be good to go!
%% Begin Waypoint %% Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver Elemental Primordials First Born %% End Waypoint %%
The Eidolons of the Elemensus Primeval are all that remain of the once great Titans. There presence stretches far and wide across the Cloud Sea but are particularly active on The Forlorn Shiver.
Tells the story of the Dyn Ilosgi.
Before there was man or women, beast or burden, and even before the so-called First Born, there were the Elemensus Primeval.
Tells the story of the Eyre Chthonic.
Tells the story of the Gwneaud O Dd≈µr.
Tells the story of the Rhedwr Gwynt.
Fought and largely destroyed the Elemental Primordials in a great calamitous battle.
This was the fable from Myrrdin’s youth that rang most true to him. The Elemental Primordials having no eyes had no need for light.
Before there was man or women, beast or burden, and even before the so-called First Born, there were the Elemensus Primeval.

The Grave Winter was a terrible winter storm that swept the island of Gramerai. It lasted for around 5 years, and in that time it brought thousands of undead and decimated the population of the island, except for the city of Candle Stone.
Full size races were shrunk into smaller races by Althar on Pytax. Original Race New Race Dragonborn Kobolds Elves Gnomes Humans Halflings
Tells the story of the Eyre Chthonic.
Tells the story of the Dyn Ilosgi.
Tells the story of the Gwneaud O Dd≈µr.
Tells the story of the Rhedwr Gwynt.
The tip of The Forlorn Shiver, is home to an old civilization of men and women who call themselves Brethyn Noswaith.
The human empire lives on a far away shard known has Hearthen. The human king, a spoiled and lazy scion of a powerful line, has recently been overthrown by his younger sister.
The light Crusade is a religion founded upon the undying flame of the Grand Lighthouse which saved Candle Stone from the advancement of the Grave Winter.
The Primevil Speakers are a group of 5 elders who function as the leadership of the Brethyn Noswaith upon The Forlorn Shiver.
A society of mages that began the construction of the Arcane Academy.
Rich noble family with a large castle in the Knuckle Mountains of Gramerai.
Rich wine making family on Gramerai. Hired the Party to “discretely” retake their estate to the east of Candle Stone.
The Ymarferydd make up a select few members of the Brethyn Noswaith who can speak directly to the Eidolons of The Forlorn Shiver.
The world has long since been shattered, and now fragments of what remains float in an endless sky known as the Cloud Sea.
Located in the Mountains to the North of Gramerai
Site of the Battle of the Boney Mire. A swamp like area in the centre of Gramerai which was overrun with undead.
Candle Stone is the capital city of the island of Gramerai, and was the only area able to withstand the effects of the Grave Winter.
The Grand Lighthouse is a large lighthouse that stands along the southern edge of the city of Candle Stone. It is the subject of religious warship by members of the Light Crusade.

Gramerai is a large island floating within the Cloud Sea. It was the central point hit by a large winter storm known as the Grave Winter, which brought large amounts of undead soldiers to the island, leaving it uninhabitable.
The knuckle mountains are small mountain range on the east side of the Shard of Gramerai.
Area to the south of Candle Stone.
1 2 x = await dv.io.load("Templates/Region - Quests.md"); dv.paragraph(x); %% Begin Waypoint %% %% End Waypoint %%
Rifton is a smaller shard floating in the Cloud Sea not too far from the island of Gramerai. 1 2 x = await dv.

Hooks In Progress 1 2 3 4 LIST FROM #hooks/in-progress WHERE any(map(file.outlinks, (x) => contains(x.file.path, this.file.folder))) SORT file.mtime DESCENDING To Do 1 2 3 4 LIST FROM #hooks/todo WHERE any(map(file.
A Beautiful and crystal clear lake which plunges to depths never before explored, some say these depths are a portal to a far off world entirely submerged in water.
The Noswaith Observatory is located on the highest point on The The Forlorn Shiver atop Mount Chiron and is used by the Brethyn Noswaith to study the stars.
Myrrdin Chosaach, born upon one of the oldest and most ancient Shards referred to by its denizens as The Forlorn Shiver.
Perhaps Lynn Ail-Lenwi leads to this place. 1 2 x = await dv.io.load("Templates/Region - Quests.md"); dv.paragraph(x); %% Begin Waypoint %%
Founder of Gramerai.
Althar fucked Lauzon. He also conquered Pytax and became the father of magic. Casting a spell so powerful (The Shrinkifying) that many creatures were shrunk and formed completely new (smaller) races.
Dragonborn leader of the Stormwind Clan. Huge asshole, and really hates the halfling leader Mr Nairo. Lives in a large wooden baracks within Candle Stone.
3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’s closest friends Therapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.
A first generation Gnome and member of the Quill Society. Sent the Party on a task to some ruins to the north of Rifton to recover some ancient draconic artifacts from the First Age.
Member of the Light Crusade and one of the leaders of the military attempting to free Gramerai from the undead caused by the Grave Winter.
Diadara was a powerful mage and founding member of the Quill Society and the Arcane Academy. She was first mentioned by Condripitus Wex.
Related to Captain Skryne. Located in the Lower Green.
Kobold Chief Counsellor. Has Major beef with Aragi, leader of the Stormwind Clan.
Nikephoros is a high ranking member in the Noswaith society and is one of few Ymarferydd on the isle of The Forlorn Shiver.

Appearance Appearance: Myrrdin Chosach is a 19yr old humanoid male with sky blue skin. Soft patches of white undulate around his exterior almost giving the illusion of clouds rolling across his person.
%% Begin Waypoint %% Lawry Myrrdin Chosaach Pyre Sneap Typhoon %% End Waypoint %%
The leader of the Blackblade Tribe, and close with his servant Sneap.
A loyal member of the Blackblade Tribe and devout follower of his king, Pyre.
tags: race/dragonborn

Therapydd was one of Myrrdin Chosaach’s life long friends from a young age. Myrrdin and Therapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.
Envoy from the Human Kingdom.
3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’s closest friends Therapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.

Myrrdin’s uncle Nikephoros completed his own A’lawdrinaieth nearly 12 years ago by scaling the sheer cliffs that line the edge of the The Forlorn Shiver until he reached the very bottom, scraping against sky itself.
Myrrdin and Therapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.
Hariotte Sparding asked us to travel to the Knuckle Mountains in order to retake the Sparding Family Castle from the undead.
One of the Dwarves we met at the Boney Mire asked us to help recover their iron mine in the Mountains to the North.
Myrrdin learned a little from the crew of the airship that he landed on. The human empire lives on a far away shard known has Hearthen.
In Progress 1 2 3 LIST FROM #quests/in-progress SORT file.mtime DESCENDING To Do 1 2 3 LIST FROM #quests/todo SORT file.
We were tasked by a member of the wineforth family to retake the Wineforth Estate. The Wineforth Family is quite wealthy.

An A’lawdrinaieth is a trial or challenge, that many people of the Brethyn Noswaith attempt during young adulthood. The trial usually consists of a long, open-ended, exploratory mission that culminates in the discovery of knowledge with scientific or cultural significance and to uncover mysteries of the Noswaith’s past, their origin‚Äôs on the forlorn shiver, and their connection with the stars.

A choker of cold black iron, set with three studs of polished steel. The wearer may use their action to sense undead until the end of their current turn, determining in generalities the presence and direction to any undead within 500 ft.

item.title: Callouts
item.description: Callout support Quartz supports the same Admonition-callout syntax as Obsidian. This includes 12 Distinct callout types (each with several aliases) Collapsable callouts See documentation on supported types and syntax here.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Configuration Quartz is designed to be extremely configurable. You can find the bulk of the configuration scattered throughout the repository depending on how in-depth you’d like to get.

item.title: Custom Domain
item.description: Registrar This step is only applicable if you are using a custom domain! If you are using a <YOUR-USERNAME>.github.io domain, you can skip this step.

item.title: Hosting with Docker
item.description: If you want to host Quartz on a machine without using a webpage hosting service, it may be easier to install Docker Compose and follow the instructions below than to install Quartz’s dependencies manually.

item.title: Ignoring Notes
item.description: Quartz Ignore Edit ignoreFiles in config.toml to include paths you’d like to exclude from being rendered. 1 2 3 4 5 6 .

item.title: Quartz Philosophy
item.description: ‚Äú[One] who works with the door open gets all kinds of interruptions, but [they] also occasionally gets clues as to what the world is and what might be important.

item.title: Search
item.description: Quartz supports two modes of searching through content. Full-text Full-text search is the default in Quartz. It produces results that exactly match the search query.

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :) Quartz Documentation (this site!) Jacky Zhao’s Garden Scaling Synthesis - A hypertext research notebook AWAGMI Intern Notes Shihyu’s PKM SlRvb’s Site Course notes for Information Technology Advanced Theory Brandon Boswell’s Garden Siyang’s Courtyard Data Dictionary üß† sspaeti.

item.title: Troubleshooting and FAQ
item.description: Still having trouble? Here are a list of common questions and problems people encounter when installing Quartz. While you’re here, join our Discord :)

item.title: Updating
item.description: Haven’t updated Quartz in a while and want all the cool new optimizations? On Unix/Mac systems you can run the following command for a one-line update!
